name: Limited Edition- Postcard from Brittany
description:
Latest date for postcard orders: July 31st.
Postcard price £3.33 including P+P plus VAT.

Milo is off to Brittany!
Are you on his postcard list? 
His holidays in Paris and Normandy were such a hit last year that Milo is off on another summer adventure. This time, he'll be holidaying in Brittany and he'd love to send your pupils a postcard telling them all about it. 
Each postcard is A5 size and will arrive in an envelope from Brittany by early September. Kick-start your French lessons with a bang in the new academic year with a personalised, handwritten message from Milo!
As your pupils will know if you ordered a postcard from him last year, there is something a little bit magical about receiving mail from Milo. His personalised message and the bright pictures of Brittany are sure to delight, inspire and engage them.
  Once ordered we will contact you by email so you can give us details of where to post the card and what you would like Milo to write.
 Let us know if you would like Milo to write in French or English and tell us any particular message you would like Milo to write.

 Our generic message (available in French or English] is:
 Hello [name of class]
 It's me, Milo!
 I am on holiday in Brittany.
 I am camping near the town of Pont Aven.
 I bought some special Traou Mad biscuits for Amélie today! (Don't tell her as it is a surprise.)
 See you soon
 Your friend Milo!

Milo is happy to write any message of a similar length. Just let us know in your email.
Latest date for postcard orders: July 31st.
Postcard price £3.33 including P+P plus VAT.

categories.name: Milo's Holiday Postcard and CDRom scrapbook

name: New! Take Brittany
description:
Special Offer for pre-orders £29.50 +VAT 
Order before 31st September. 
Usual price £35
Jennie Wilson, creator of the Bonjour Milo! adventures, has co-written a new intercultural understanding resource called Take Brittany.
Designed for KS1 and KS2 children, the disc has footage of pupils from a Breton school carrying out art, cookery and cultural activities that can be recreated in your classroom.
Baking Breton biscuits, making Quimper-style pottery, painting like Paul Gauguin, dancing, performing and role-playing are among the activities in the collection of eight cross-curricular units.
This fantastic new resource is due to be released by Dart Education in September, but you can reserve your copy today from us. We are able to offer a special introductory price of £29.50 on the resource for orders made before September 31, 2013 - that's a £5.50 discount. 
Please note Take Brittany does not feature Milo and his friends and has a completely different format to the Bonjour Milo! stories. However, we are sure your pupils will love it!

Take Brittany is designed to be used flexibly and could form the basis of a Breton Culture week. Or the units could be integrated into any scheme of work. 
Each unit has a creative piece of work as an end outcome and is supported with step-by-step teaching notes, a PowerPoint slideshow and a video on an aspect of Breton culture featuring the children of Ecole Sanquer, in southern Brittany.

name: New! Bonjour Milo! bundle
description:
price £59.99 + VAT (added by PayPal)

The Bonjour Milo! bundle includes:
Bonjour Milo! Sports Challenge
Bonjour Milo! Rainforest Quest
Bonjour Milo! Under-the-Sea Adventure

Three PC CD-Roms 
•Designed for children aged 4-8 (Foundation, KS1 and KS2)
•No existing knowledge of French necessary
•Ideal for electronic whiteboard

Bonjour Milo! PC CDs give children a magical start to learning French. 
Starring a boy called Milo and his best friend Amélie, these beautifully animated mini adventures work as a short plays, songs, stories, dances or puppet shows.

Key Features
• Exciting storylines linked to popular curricular themes.
• Practice in core language structures to be built on in KS2 and beyond.
• Catchy songs and scripts performed by French native speaker.
• Adorable characters to whom the children become attached.
• Rhyme, rhythm and repetition to support natural language acquisition.
• Colourful animation and actions to aid children's comprehension.
• Printable resources to aid children's memory and performance.
• Flexibility to be used in multiple ways and at your own pace.
• Ideal for performance.
• Easy to use. 

What is on each disc?
• Warm-up video with an introduction to rainbow colours and footage of children meeting the animated characters.
• Animated musical version of the story featuring a native French singer.
• Spoken Storybook version with sound files featuring a native French speaker.
• Action video showing children performing the musical version.
• Language Maker Video showing children using the language from the story.
•Language Maker Grids to support children in building phrases using language structures from the story.
• Teacher support notes including translated transcripts.
• Printable pictures (colour and black-and-white) for use as flashcards or puppets, and templates to create headbands, a story slider and tabletop theatre.

Minimum Computer requirements:
Operating System: Windows XP or later
CD-Rom Drive: Min. 4x
Processor Speed: 1.6 ghz
RAM: Min 512 MB
Display: Min 65k-colour display

Video Card: Required (min 800 x 600)
Sound Card: Required

Speakers or headphones: Required

categories.name: Bonjour Milo! Musical Stories on CD Rom (French)

name: New! À l’école CD- French songs for classroom routines
description:
(£11.99 inc VAT)
 
Sing your way through the day....en français!
 
Featuring children from L'Ecole Française de Bristol, this collection of short, fun songs will help you integrate French into daily classroom routines.
 Each song is linked to a typical primary classroom transition time, such as lunch and tidying up, and comes with an instrumental version and translated lyrics. There are also lovely French versions of Happy Birthday and Jingle Bells for those special occasions.
 The songs not only embed key French phrases and vocabulary but act as a tool for getting everybody doing what they are meant to be doing!
 
Track list. (each track comes with an instrumental version)
 
1. Bonjour mes amis (Hello friends) 
2. Venez tous (Come on everyone) 
3. Mettez-vous en rang (Line up) 
4. C'est midi (It's lunchtime) 
5. Rangeons la salle de classe (Let's tidy up) 
6. Au revoir mes copains (Bye friends) 
7. Bon weekend (Have a good weekend) 
8. Bon weekend - short version 
9. Vive le vent (Jingle Bells) 
10. Joyeux anniversaire (Happy birthday)

This is a mixed mode CD. It contains audio and data.
You can listen to the Sparkle Speak songs by playing the CD in a standard audio CD player.
If you put the CD into your computer and navigate to the CD drive you will be able to access the data files: mp3 versions of the songs and a pdf of translated lyrics and credits.
 
Audio samples are available on our YouTube channel http://www.youtube.com/user/sparklespeak

name: Bonjour Milo! Sports Challenge
description:
£29.99 inc VAT £24.99 exc VAT

This sporty new Milo adventure will get your children running, jumping and speaking French! 

•PC CD-Rom 
•Designed for children aged 4-8 (Foundation, KS1 and KS2)
•No existing knowledge of French necessary
•Ideal for electronic whiteboard

It's school sports day and Milo's friends are limbering up to compete in their favourite events - running, swimming and jumping. 
Milo remains strictly on the sidelines until he gets caught up in a daring trampoline jump and accidentally wins a gold medal!


Bonjour Milo! Sports Challenge gives children a magical start to learning French. 
Starring a boy called Milo and his best friend Amélie, this beautifully animated mini adventure works as a short play, song, story, dance or puppet show.

Key Features
• Exciting storyline linked to a popular curricular theme.
• Practice in core language structures to be built on in KS2 and beyond.

• Rhyme, rhythm and repetition to support natural language acquisition.
• Colourful animation and actions to aid children's comprehension.
• Printable resources to aid children's memory and performance.
• Flexibility to be used in multiple ways and at your own pace.
• Ideal for performance.

name: Holiday CD Rom scrapbook from Milo in Paris
description:
Sorry. This item is sold out. 
We are planning to release a new disc soon. If you would like to pre-order the disc please email info@sparklespeak.co.uk

Milo is off on holiday to Paris.
Join his adventures with this CD Rom containing a PowerPoint presentation of his holiday photos along with teaching notes and bilingual instructions for an art activity based on Paris.
This resource is a fun way to weave some intercultural understanding into your French lessons and can be adapted for use with children aged four-to-nine.

name: NEW! Milo Reward Stickers and Postcard pack (105 stickers 35 postcards)
description:
(£5.40 inc VAT)

Reward your class for their brilliant work using the Bonjour Milo! Musical Stories with these fun postcards and stickers.

Each pack contains 35 postcards and 105 stickers, including 70 saying Bravo! and 35 saying Joyeux anniversaire - happy birthday.

The front of each card features Milo with a big star saying ‘Bravo!’.  On the back there is space for the pupil’s name and a pre-printed message in French congratulating your pupil, followed by Milo’s signature.

The postcards are A6 and the stickers are 1 in (25mm) diameter.
